translation.verifyPhoneNumberDesc: We will send a code - it help us keep yours account secure.
translation.otpVerification: Enter the 6-digit security code we send to you at ******
translation.isHideEndDate: Hide the end time of slot
translation.termsAndprivacy: By clicking 'Confirm booking,' you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, granting us permission to use your personal information in accordance with our policies.
translation.serviceDeleted: This action will remove all associated information permanently.

desc.weSendSms: We've sent an SMS to confirm your booking, You can review your booking details there.
desc.bussRootDesc: Elevate your booking experience quickly and conveniently.
desc.bookingRejectDesc: Tell the customer why they were rejected.
desc.bookingHasApproved: Your booking has been automatically confirmed. We will send you the details via SMS.
desc.bookingHasCancelled: This appointment has been canceled. You can make a new appointment.
desc.bookingHasDeclined: Sorry for the inconvenience. Your reservation has been declined.
desc.bookingHasExpired: The available time has already passed. This appointment has expired.
desc.waitingForApproval: We’ve submitted it to the store. We’ll send you the details via SMS once booking is confirmed.
desc.busineessApprovedSuccessful: The system will send an SMS to the customer to notify them of this approval.
desc.busineessRejectedSuccessful: The system will send an SMS to the customer to notify them of this rejection.

cancel.confirmation: Are you sure to cancel booking
cancel.confirmationDesc: Booking slot will be available to others.

approve.confirmation: Are you sure you want to approve this booking
approve.confirmationDesc: Once approved, the customer will be notified, and the booking will be finalized.

reject.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reject this booking
reject.confirmationDesc: Once rejected, the customer will be notified, and the booking will be finalized.

shopName.shopNameMax: Shop name must be less than 50 characters

username.usernameMax: Username must be less than 50 characters

phoneNumbers.phoneNumberMax: Phone number must be less than 10 digits

error.noServicesYet: Your business doesn't have any service, create service frist
error.tooManyRequest: Too many requests. Please try again after 60 seconds.

placeholder.bookingReject: Ex. The service is not available at the requested time.
